title: (x) Cute slab serif in "Thesis" WordPress Theme- PMN Caecilia {Jan E}
content:
Anyone?

The headings on [http://diythemes.com/thesis/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018085804/http:/diythemes.com/thesis/ "http://diythemes.com/thesis/")

Thanks again :)
author: kylefox

comments.content:
This must be Noordzij Day. We have already mentioned fonts by all three of them, father Gerrit (Tret) and two sons Peter Matthias (Caecilia) and Christoph (Collis).

- Mike Yanega
How ironic that the WordPress theme is called [Thesis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018085804/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/197268636/).

_How ironic that the WordPress theme is called Thesis._

Exactly what I thought. I checked twice to make sure it isn’t TheSerif.
